name: Planetary Adventure
description:
Tut in game

The tutorial is kind of glitched so this is what it says if you could not read it:

“wasd to Move… I’d hope you would know that by now…” “Left click for sword attack. Right click for shield c’mon now it aint that hard. “ + “Don’t forget to hit the fuel. You just crashlanded and need stuff since you have nothing” “Now use the skills I hope you have learned to fight this simple charger enemy(Dont forget to attack then hit the enemy, fuel canister, etc.)” “Now go look for something that ‘looks’ like a spaceship(you will be able to tell with the large text that shows up) after picking up fuel”
